body:
Upstream project [fixed an unbound shell variable](https://github.com/TACC/Lmod/commit/dbc4472dbbda9804b5d996579c55d611d1171fd3), which looks like it made it into versions >= 7.8.6.   This PR adds the latest lmod release, which is 7.8.15.

Tested on Centos 7.6

FYI @hartzell
title: lmod: add version 7.8.15
